statements: DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND compliance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'Company XYZ' AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE id = 100 AND compliance_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM law_regulations WHERE law_category = 'Financial' AND law_name = 'Sarbanes-Oxley Act';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND compliance_status = true;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND amount > 1000;
